sense.name: store in a hive like bees
sense.commentary: Includes the VPC hive away, hive up
sense.examples: The bees hived up that honey. I had hived away a collection of empty plastic water bottles. Always check your air cleaner if it's been hived away. The recordings are hived away for improper use.

sense.name: move or gather in a hive
sense.commentary: Includes the VPC hive off Syntax includes: NP1[agent] HIVE NP2[theme] NP1[theme] HIVE
sense.examples: They hived off to form their own covens. They hived them as two colonies. They hived off key assets, such as the lease-car business. At least 50000 bees hived within the walls of one of our rooms. Honey bees hived in a prototypic pollination unit. If you moved them when you hived the first swarm, they'll swarm again.
